q: Charlotte. The 49ers neutralized Tu Holloway , a player of the year candidate, and handed the Musketeers their first A-10 loss, 66-62. Tu Holloway missed all eight of his three-point tries and went 3 of 17 overall. It's like in football if you're playing Michael Vick , 49ers coach Alan Major told the Charlotte Observer.`` You'd rather Michael Vick throw it than run. We'd rather have[ Tu Holloway ] shooting over you rather than driving around you.'' 9. Poor man

of Evansville political science professor. If Mike Pence is to encounter any bumps at all, they could come early, as he shifts his focus from federal to state issues, Robert Dion said. In some cases, it can be an awkward transition, to go from being a lawmaker to an executive, and to go from the federal level to the state level. There's going to be that transition that might have a few hiccups to it, he said.`` But he's familiar with all the issues, he's an energetic campaigner, he's got solid conservative credentials, he knows how to raise money.''
